revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=CG3100D |revision=v3 |asin= |est_release_date=04/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model=ACM6280 |manuf_rev=REV 2.00 (A) |availability=now |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=PY309300119 |pcb_id=ACM6280 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3380G;BCM3380GKFSBG; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL064P |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Pegatron UPWL6025 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43225 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, heatsink, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=84:1B:5E |oui_eth=84:1B:5E }} {{TagLine|Wireless Cable Gateway}}
"PCB MADE IN CHINA" and "ACM6280 REV:2.00 (A)" (ASUS P/N) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos.
[[Pegatron]] is the presumed OEM. :DOCSIS 3.0 8x4<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
The default SSID pattern may be '''CG3100DXX''' for at least some [http://bendbroadband.com/residential/pdfs/Netgear%20Customer%20Instructions%20FINALv4.pdf units] :.. and possible '''XXXXXX''' (upper case hex digits) for others.
This device appears to use [[Broadcom]] BCM3380GKFSBG.
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/cg3100dv3 ''Netgear CG3100D v3'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.forocoches.com/foro/showthread.php?t=2693631 On '''ForoCoches''' forums] (PCB images)
===See also=== *[[Netgear CG3100D-2]] (2BPAUS) - [https://www.technovelty.org/linux/netgear-cg3100d-2-investigation.html Boot/eCos/Linux] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM3383G-B0, Switch: BCM53125, :Flash: 16/32MB (SPI), RAM: 128MB, [00:10:18]
